entry.title: BREAKING: Ethereumâ€™s Ropsten Testnet Merge Is Complete
entry.summary: On June 8, the public Ropsten testnet transitioned from Proof-of-Work consensus to Proof-of-Stake.

entry.title: Liquid Staking Providers Buck Bear Market With Hefty Inflows
entry.summary: Data Shows $2.3B Flow Into Lido as Other Protocols Suffer Withdrawals

entry.title: PayPal Enables Crypto Withdrawals to Non-Custodial Wallets
entry.summary: In addition to allowing users to withdraw crypto assets to external wallets like MetaMask, PayPal is enabling its users to transfer digital assets between themselves.

entry.title: Kirobo Launches Crypto-Native Estate Planning Tool
entry.summary: Liquid Vaults can be used to designate up to eight wallets to inherit funds after a certain time period.

entry.title: Circle Expands Beyond Ethereum With Support For USDC On Polygon
entry.summary: The move will enable Polygon-based businesses and developers to decrease settlement times and lower costs by accessing USDC directly.
